properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Galveston Bay
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 17 at 10:35PM CST until January 18 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to less than one mile.

* WHERE...Galveston Bay and Coastal waters from High Island to
Freeport TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Web cameras at Bolivar Roads and along the
Bolivar Peninsula have shown the development of dense marine fog
within the last hour. An expansion of this advisory may be
required should additional areas of fog develop.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST SATURDAY
